DataElement.preferredName: G-8 Screening Tool Age Score Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response indicating the patient's age category.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tool for the assessment of geriatric cancer patients. It combines 7 questions from the mini nutritional assessment (MNA) with one question regarding subject age. Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tool for the assessment of geriatric cancer patients. It combines 7 questions from the mini nutritional assessment (MNA) with one question regarding subject age. Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health.

Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Rave study NRG-HN004 - smt 9/12/17

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual's age is or was greater than 85 years.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual's age is or was greater than 85 years.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual's age is or was between 80 and 85 years.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual's age is or was between 80 and 85 years.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual's age is or less than 80 years.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual's age is or less than 80 years.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.origin: G-8:Geriatric 8 Screening Tool, C.A. Bellera, et al. Annals of Oncology 23: 2166-2172, 2012
